## plugin-messages package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Messages](./plugin-messages.messages.md) | Messages are how people communicate in rooms. Each message timestamped and represented in Webex as a distinct block of content. Messages can contain plain text and a single file attachment. See the [Message Attachments](https://developer.webex.com/docs/api/basics#message-attachments) Guide for a list of supported media types.  |
